page.title: 07ECOLOGY (2)
page.content: include{meadow brown, ringlet, {marbled white}and several species of {skipper butterfly}(including the uncommon{grizzled skipper}). Bird species noted include {chiffchaff, {grasshopper warbler, collared dove, {green woodpecker, nuthatch, yellow {bunting, sparrow hawk, skylark}and other more common species. Uncut roadside verges contain a varied flora. Woodland areas of various sizes exist and contain mainly indigenous species e.g.{oak}and{ash}as dominant species with{hawthorn}and{hazel}understory. A few areas contain exotic species mainly as a result of planting by the {Croome Estate}as amenity woodland. Evidence was apparant of mammalian species such as{squirrel, fox, badger, {rabbits}and many small mammals. D.A.|C.G
